name: Qumdaq
description: The Qumdaq is a small elemental creature embodying sand and earth, displaying a unique ability to manipulate its environment.
memorable: It can burst into a shower of sand upon death to heal nearby allies or grant them temporary hit points.
goals: To support allies in battle and manipulate the battlefield through burrowing.
relations: It may be found alongside other elemental creatures or those related to earth and sand.
environment: Commonly found in desert areas or regions with loose earth.
strengths: Ability to burrow without disturbing the surroundings; condition immunities make it resilient to control effects.
weaknesses: Low hit points that render it vulnerable if targeted directly.
attacks: Slam attack dealing bludgeoning damage; can create a damaging Desiccation Field attack.
most_powerful_ability: Desiccation Field, which damages and exhausts multiple foes at once.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense within 30 feet, allowing it to perceive its environment effectively.
skills: Has average perception skills, indicating it can detect danger but lacks proficiency in it.
additional_information: Elemental nature allows it to function without air, food, or sleep.
Gains advantage on attacks when allies are near, encouraging teamwork in battle.
Can sense magical auras within 60 feet without consuming spell resources.

earth creature that can burrow without disturbance
elemental that exhausts foes with swirling sand
neutral creature made of earth and sand
small creature that supports allies in battle
